Title: Participating in Official Activities
Content: Participating in official activities on Xiaohongshu is one of the most effective ways to increase the exposure of your product notes. To do this, open the Xiaohongshu homepage, click on the three horizontal lines in the top left corner, and select 'Creation Center.' Scroll down to find 'Creative Inspiration' and choose a topic related to your notes or industry. Publish your notes under this topic. Additionally, follow official accounts related to your industry, such as 'Fashion Bureau' for clothing or 'Pet Bureau' for pet-related content. These accounts regularly post activity topics and provide traffic support. By actively participating in these official activities and topics, you can significantly boost your exposure as the platform promotes these topics to make them popular.

Title: Utilizing Growth Boost for Free Traffic
Content: The Growth Boost feature on Xiaohongshu allows you to gain free traffic exposure without spending money on promotions. To access this feature, click on your profile, then the three horizontal lines in the top left corner, and select 'Creation Center.' Click on 'Growth Boost' to see how much traffic the platform has rewarded you. To earn more free traffic, complete tasks provided by the platform. If you do not see the Growth Boost option, participate in popular topics and activities first, as this will unlock the feature. The amount of traffic you receive depends on the quality of your notes. By leveraging this feature, you can significantly increase your exposure and reach a wider audience without incurring additional costs.

Title: Embedding Hot Search Keywords in Notes
Content: Embedding hot search keywords in your notes is a strategic way to increase their visibility on Xiaohongshu. Users often use Xiaohongshu as a search engine to find specific content. For example, during holidays, users might search for travel destinations. To capitalize on this, include relevant keywords in your note's cover, title, and content. For instance, if you are promoting pants, use keywords like 'slimming pants' in your title and description. You can find trending keywords in the Xiaohongshu merchant version app under each category. Choose high-traffic keywords relevant to your content to ensure precise targeting. Properly embedding these keywords can significantly enhance your note's exposure and attract more traffic, as the platform's algorithm will favor your content in search results.
